title: Chinese Word List
content: Chinese Word List Chinese Word List 苹果 (apple), 香蕉 (banana), 橙子 (orange), 西瓜 (melon), 等等。

title: English Word List
content: English Word List English Word List apple, banana, orange, melon, etc.

title: Japanese Word List
content: Japanese Word List Japanese Word List りんご (apple), バナナ (banana), オレンジ (orange), メロン (melon), など。

title: Korean Word List
content: Korean Word List Korean Word List 사과 (apple), 바나나 (banana), 오렌지 (orange), 멜론 (melon), 등등.

title: Russian Word List
content: Russian Word List Russian Word List яблоко (apple), банан (banana), апельсин (orange), дыня (melon), и т.д.

title: Vietnamese Word List
content: Vietnamese Word List Vietnamese Word List Táo (apple), Chuối (banana), Cam (orange), Dưa hấu (melon), v.v.
